title: Para Para Pattaampoochi Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh
stanzas:
Para Para Pattaampoochi Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh
#Yuvan #NaMuthukumar

Para para para para
pattaam poochi
thoda thoda thoda thoda
pala vannam aachu

idhu oru idhu oru
pudhu kannaamoochi
idhayathin vaanilai
adhu maari pochu

kanneerai thudaikkum
viralukku manam
yaendi kidakkudhe

thanneeril irukkum
erumbukku ilai
padagu aanadhe

Para para para para
pattaam poochi
thoda thoda thoda thoda
pala vannam aachu

idhu oru idhu oru
pudhu kannaamoochi
idhayathin vaanilai
adhu maari pochu

inbam oru puram endru
thunbam maru puram endru
sutri chuzhathu indha
mann melae.

thannathani aal endru
yaarum illai endru
ullam sollundhu indru
anbaale

yedho yedho oru unarchi
eri thazhalil mazhaiyin
kulirchi

kadal alaigal modhi
modhi manam
sirppam aagudhe

edhirile andha mazhalai
kaalam meendum
thirumbudhe

Para para para para
pattaam poochi
thoda thoda thoda thoda
pala vannam aachu

idhu oru idhu oru
pudhu kannaamoochi
idhayathin vaanilai
adhu maari pochu

Vazhkai enbadhu enna
pallip paadamum alla
kattruk kondathu mella
munnera.

kadhal enbadhu enna
pullik kolamum alla
kaatril kalaiyum podhum
thallaada

engo engo orr ulagam
unakkaaga kaathu kidakkum
nigazh kaalam nadhiyai
pola mella nagarndhu poguthe

nadhi kaayalaam
ninaivill ulla katchi
kaayumaa ?

Para para para para
pattaam poochi
thoda thoda thoda thoda
pala vannam aachu

idhu oru idhu oru
pudhu kannaamoochi
idhayathin vaanilai
adhu maari pochu

kanneerai thudaikkum
viralukku manam
yaendi kidakkudhe

thanneeril irukkum
erumbukku ilai
padagu aanadhe

Para para para para
pattaam poochi
thoda thoda thoda thoda
pala vannam aachu

idhu oru idhu oru
pudhu kannaamoochi
idhayathin vaanilai
adhu maari pochu

seo.description: Get the complete Para Para Pattaampoochi Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh from Kattradhu Thamizh. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Rahul Nambiar. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Kattradhu Thamizh, Yuvan, Rahul Nambiar, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
